title: MT Pass
sinopse: "You shall meet your true love today..." This was the fortune that Magic Tower's top fortune-teller (and not to mention hottest), Aki, predicted. The girl he met that did was named Saya, part of Aki's brother's fortune-telling club. Saya simply cannot believe it, but Aki tells her fortune and it's the same! Could this fortune really come true? If you do not tell one fortune right, you are forced to leave your position at MT... (Source: Starry Heaven)
